Uses of Class
myfuel.DBHandler.DBHandler

  • Packages that use DBHandler 
    Package Description
    myfuel.DBHandler  

    • Uses of DBHandler in myfuel.DBHandler

      Subclasses of DBHandler in myfuel.DBHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnalysticDBHandler
      This class will be used to get / set Analyze details
      class  ChangePasswordDBHandler
      This DB Controller responsible for changing password request.
      class  CheckInventoryDBHandler
      This class is responsible for managing the inventory orders for specific station
      class  ConfirmationDBHandler
      This class is responsible for getting and setting Customers that needs to be approved
      class  ConfirmNewRatesDBHandler
      This class will be used as a DBHandler for getting and updating Company Rates
      class  CPromotionTemplateDBHandler
      This class is responsible for updating the DB with the created Promotion Template
      class  FuelOrderDBHandler
      Car Fuel Database Handler, responsible for all the related Car fuel queries.
      class  HomeControlDBHandler
      This class is responsible for managing the Home Fuel Details as listed in the DB
      class  LoginDBHandler
      Log In Database Controller, responsible for Log In queries.
      class  LowInventoryDBHandler
      Updates / Gets The details about the quantities in a station
      class  MakeaPromotionDBHandler
      This class is responsible for Updating the DB with new Promotion
      class  MMReportDBHandler
      This class will has the necessary queries and methods to get the details for the Marketing Manager reports
      class  NetworkReportsDBHandler
      Company Reports DBHAndler - will get the Stations reports from the DB
      class  PurchaseDBHandler
      This DB Handler handle all the queries related to the customer purchase user interface.
      class  RegisterDBHandler
      Register Database Handler, responsible for all the related register queries.
      class  SetNewRatesDBHandler
      This class will Handle the update of the rates for the networks
      class  SReportsDBHandler
      Station Reports DBHandler - will get the specific report details from the DB and if possible will save them in the DB
      class  SWDBHandler
      Station Worker DBHandler - will get and set Inventory Order Details to the worker's station
      class  UpdateDetailsDBHandler
      Update Details Database Handler, responsible for all the related update details queries.
